text: Henrique Soares da Costa (11 April 1963 â€“ 18 July 2020) was a Brazilian Roman Catholic bishop. He was bishop of the diocese of Palmares from 2014 until 2020. He was born in Penedo, Alagoas. Costa died in Recife, Brazil on 18 July 2020 from COVID-19, aged 57.alece o bispo da diocese de Palmares (PE), dom Henrique Soares da Costa ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Recife Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Pernambuco
